articles.author: Joe Miller, Joshua Franklin
articles.title: JPMorgan executives joked about Jeffrey Epstein's behaviour, US Virgin Islands alleges - Financial Times
articles.description: Filing comes in litigation accusing the bank of benefiting from its relationship with the late sex offender
articles.content: JPMorgan Chase executives allegedly joked about Jeffrey Epsteins interest in young girls while the disgraced financier was a client of the US banking giant, lawyers for the US Virgin Islands have cla… [+3012 chars]
